name: LivingWellwithChronicConditions
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Sharing day-to-day tips and tools for when living with a chronic condition in order to help you navigate through the ups and downs living a full productive life. Listen to Living Well With Chronic Conditions for tips and tools on how to create daily habits that support our health and wellbeing when living with chronic conditions. From Monday through Friday we will be sharing insights, quotes, and quick tips that will help you navigate through the daily struggles and learn what serves you to live your best life. Living Well With Chronic Conditions does not provide medical advice. It is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
